sentences.chinese: 每一個偉大的演講撰稿人都知道這一點。

sentences.english: I also wrote articales for newspapers and journals , to make some extra money.
sentences.chinese: 並且爲報刊撰稿賺取外快。

sentences.english: Persist to work hard in her the dream that that freedom write as of oldly.
sentences.chinese: 依舊的在她的那自由撰稿的夢裏執着着打拼着呀。

sentences.english: Several writers for the Guardian have made what I believe is an unjustifiable leap.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，衛報的幾位撰稿人來了個離譜的大躍進。
公司僱有幾個自由撰稿人。

sentences.english: Naomi Li is a freelance writer based in London.
sentences.chinese: 李潔華是駐倫敦的特約撰稿人。

sentences.english: At the end of 2001, I moved to Shanghai to be a career artist and free writer.
sentences.chinese: 2001年末旅居上海做職業畫家與自由撰稿人。

sentences.english: The scientist often contributes to an academic journal.
sentences.chinese: 這位科學家常常給那家學術期刊撰稿。

sentences.english: Mara Hvistendahl is a Shanghai-based freelance writer.
sentences.chinese: 馬語琴是駐在上海的自由撰稿作家。

sentences.english: I worked for newspapers and freelanced for magazines.
sentences.chinese: 我給報紙和雜誌專欄撰稿。

sentences.english: To contribute to this book directly on-wiki, you'll have to create an account and log in.
sentences.chinese: 如果想對本書撰稿，您可以直接上維基。

sentences.english: I work as an assistant copywriter for Yatai Culture Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 我現在於亞泰文化公司任助理撰稿員。

sentences.english: The 32-year-old freelance journalist was found guilty last month on charges of espionage.
sentences.chinese: 32歲的自由撰稿記者薩貝里上個月被判犯有間諜罪。

sentences.english: You may call me a newspaper addict or free-lance writer.
sentences.chinese: 叫我報蟲也好，叫我自由撰稿人也罷。

sentences.english: But Reagan didn’t need a speechwriter. He was a good one himself.
sentences.chinese: 但是里根根本不需要撰稿人，因爲他自己就能勝任。

sentences.english: But Reagan and his speechwriters insisted on keeping it in.
sentences.chinese: 但里根和撰稿人堅持保留這句話。

definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
(publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
to supervise the manufacture of/to supervise the shooting of films/executive producer (film)
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
